nodes.text: Xylan Graf was a human male member of the Graf family who lived during the time of the High Republic Era. Graf was present alongside the hauler Sylvestri Yarrow on the capital planet Coruscant.

Xylan Graf is a character who featured in the 2021 novel The High Republic: Out of the Shadows, written by Justina Ireland. In the first draft of the novel, Ireland expected Sylvestri Yarrow to be in a love triangle that included her ex-girlfriend, Jordanna Sparkburn, and Graf. After beginning to write, however, Ireland determined that neither Yarrow nor herself particularly liked Graf, and dropped the idea halfway through the first draft.
